description: One of the primary building block components. This card component comes with several fields to ensure flexibility.

modifiers.name: .su-card--horizontal
modifiers.description: Postcard with image on the side.

modifiers.name: .su-card--link
modifiers.description: Whole card is a clickable link with no link buttons or CTA link.

modifiers.name: .su-card--minimal
modifiers.description: No border, material shadow or background color. Do not use this with the .su-card--link variant.
